thobe.widgets.splitPanel

Class SPFrameContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPFrame
      • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPFrameContainer

  • public class SPFrameContainer
extends SPFrame
    A class that represents the composite of the composite design-pattern. This special node can be used to combine two SPFrames to be able to build up the tree that represents the hierarchy of the subframes of the SplitPanel.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus

      • setSize

        public void setSize(double size)
        Sets the size of the first child. The given size should be given as a value between 0 and 1 as the relation of the first nodes size compared to the containers size. That is the percentage of space (offered by the container) the first node occupies. The remaining percentage (1-size) will be used for the second child.
        Parameters:
        size -
